translation.en: This is Andy Barclay.
Eight years ago he touched off the scandal...
translation.ko: 8년 전 이 소년이 일으킨 스캔들로 인해

translation.en: that nearly crippled this company,
claiming that his Good Guy doll, Chucky, was possessed by...
translation.ko: 자신의 좋은 친구 인형 처키가 찰스 리 레이 영혼에 사로잡혔다고 주장했습니다

translation.en: Charles Lee Ray,
translation.ko: 찰스 리 레이 영혼에 사로잡혔다고 주장했습니다

translation.en: the notorious Lakeshore Strangler.
Now I ask you, ladies and gentlemen,
after the lawsuits and negative publicity,
when the company is finally getting back on its feet again,
where is the wisdom in putting the Good Guy back on the market?
translation.ko: 그런 이때 좋은 친구 인형을 다시 판매해야 할까요?

translation.en: Mr. Sullivan, before this happened...
the Good Guy outsold all our other toys two to one.
translation.ko: 좋은 친구 판매량은 나머지 인형을 다 합쳐도 2배가 넘었죠

translation.en: Even now, interest in the marketplace is at its peak.
translation.ko: 스캔들이 있었음에도 시장의 관심은 어느 때보다 뜨겁습니다

translation.en: The factory is up and running again.
We should be in stores by next week.
We cannot let the fantasies of one disturbed boy...
translation.ko: 정신적으로 문제가 있는 소년의 공상 때문에

translation.en: influence company policy.
Well, what if the doll somehow... affects another child in a negative way?
translation.ko: 그랬다가 인형이 다른 아이에게도 부정적인 영향을 주면요?

translation.en: You could have a public relations nightmare on your hands.
translation.ko: 그럼 회사 이미지는 땅에 떨어질 겁니다

translation.en: You know, one of the hardest things about this business is...
translation.ko: 이 사업이 직면한 까다로운 문제 중 하나가

translation.en: that it is a business.
Doesn't matter what we're selling,
whether it's cars, nuclear weapons... or yes, even toys.
translation.ko: 차를 팔든 핵무기를 팔든 그래, 인형을 팔든

translation.en: The bottom line is the bottom line.
translation.ko: 중요한 건 장사꾼은 물건을 팔아야 한다는 거야

translation.en: And what are children, after all, but consumer trainees?
translation.ko: 아이들도 결국엔 뭔가? 소비자 훈련을 받는 사람이라고

translation.en: Andy Barclay is ancient history.
No one remembers him. Nobody cares.
translation.ko: 아무도 기억 못 하지 아무도 상관 안 해

translation.en: I have made up my mind. We're moving ahead.
Thank you.
Okay. All right.
Mr. Sullivan,
if there's nothing I can say to convince you,
then I must go on record with my position.
I'm completely against this.
Your position is crystal clear, Miles.
And you can be sure I won't forget.
Uh, just a minute, folks, please.
Mr. Sullivan, we have a little surprise for you.
Guys at the factory sent this over and we all wanted you to have it.
It's the first one off the assembly line-- the Good Guy of the 90's.
Well, if there's nothing else, I'm gonna get going.
translation.ko: “좋은 친구는 가장 친한 친구가 되고 싶어요” 더 시키실 일 없으면 이만 퇴근하겠습니다

translation.en: Fine.
It's just, my wife's expecting me.
It's our anniversary. Fine, Petzold.
Well, I-- I guess I could review the Larrabee report after dinner.
translation.ko: 저녁 먹고 나서 라라비 보고서 검토할게요

translation.en: Good night, Mr. Sullivan.
Good night.
Well, despite a downdraft in the bond market,
stocks were able to post a rally on Friday...
thanks to a couple of different factors.
Not only did the stronger-than-expected employment report...
allay some recession fears,
but also there was a technical rebound in stocks...
translation.ko: 주식의 기술적 반등 쇼트 커버링, 프로그램 구매

translation.en: and a resurgence in the deal stocks helped set the tone...
for a rally on the street.
Here's a look at the numbers. The Dow Industrial's up 16 and two-thirds.
translation.ko: 하나씩 살펴보시죠 금요일 다우 지수는 16.6 상승했습니다 하루 중 거래가 가장 활발한 때

translation.en: The transportation average up a little better than three.
Utilities bouncing up a point, up 12 to 2261.78.
S&P 500 cash up better than two,
with the March features up almost two and a half.
The premium ending at 1.59.
New York Stock Exchange index up 1.23.
Volume backing off a bit at 164 million shares.
Advances beat declines just about nine to five on the New York Stock Exchange.
translation.ko: 뉴욕 증권 거래소는 상승 대 하강이 9대 5로

translation.en: The up volume, 103 million shares. The down volume, 39.4--
translation.ko: 상승 대 하강이 9대 5로 거래량이 1억 3백만 주로 증가한 모습을…

translation.en: In a moment's time--
Well, shit.
T-bills and bonds headed south on the stronger-than-expected economic data,
which served to bolster the U.S. dollar.
The dollar index up a quarter point.

Hi, my name is Pauly.

translation.en: You're my only ticket out of here, Andy.
I gotta get out of this goddamn body.

Inward hut.

You can do it, Jackson! Hurry up! Yeah, move! Yeah!
Come on! Let's go! Yeah! Come on!
Get moving. Go to the end of the line.

you've been in one foster home after another.
Mind if I ask why?
translation.ko: 위탁 가정을 여러 차례 옮겼구나 이유가 뭐지?

translation.en: They took me away from my mother.
She's, uh... under special care.
I know that.
I meant how come you never got settled anywhere?
translation.ko: 내 질문은 왜 위탁 가정에 정착하지 못했느냐는 거야

translation.en: Adjustment problems.
I can read, Barclay.
I'm asking you.
I never felt comfortable with those people.
They weren't family. They were strangers.
All right, listen up, Barclay.
I'm willing to cut you some slack because you've had it rough.
translation.ko: 어려운 일을 겪었으니 특별히 입학을 허락하마

translation.en: But you're a troublemaker.
And I got a real problem with troublemakers.
They don't fit into the system.
translation.ko: 난 말썽꾼을 정말 좋아하지 않아 말썽꾼은 제도와 안 맞거든

translation.en: So here's my advice.
translation.ko: 그런 뜻에서 조언 한 가지 하마

translation.en: You're not a kid anymore.
translation.ko: 철 좀 들어 넌 이제 어린애가 아니야

translation.en: It's time to forget these fantasies of killer dolls.
translation.ko: 킬러 인형이니 뭐니 하는 황당한 얘기는 집어치우란 말이다

translation.en: Yes, sir.
"When I was a child, I thought as a child.
translation.ko: ‘내가 어렸을 때는 생각하는 것이 어린아이 같다가’

translation.en: But when I became a man, I put away childish things."
I Corinthians.
Look alive, Barclay. On your feet.
At Kent, we take bed-wetters and turn 'em into men.
Oh, yes.
Yes, oh, yes.
We're seeing some skin now, aren't we?
Presto. You're bald.
Always feels a little weird at first.
Next.
Kiss it good-bye.
You know, the Romans invented the military cut.
You know why? Why?
To keep their hair short,
so their enemies couldn't grab ahold of it in battle...
and slit their throat.

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] Now hold still.
Oh, shit. [ Chuckles ]
♪♪ [ TV: Jingle ]
[ TV: Boy ] We're back and we're better than ever.

translation.en: and I'll be your friend to the end.

translation.en: You will? [ Echoing ] Wow!
- Sure I will! - [ Both ] Hi-de-ho!
So all aboard for high-flying fun with me, your friend to the end.

translation.en: The Good Guy doll from Play Pals.
Are you okay?
Bastards! Fucking bastards!

I'm Andy.

Yeah. Yeah.
How you doing? Pretty good.
Good.

Do you know who I am?
Shelton? That's Lieutenant Colonel Shelton to you, asshole!
No.
Lieutenant Colonel... Shelton...
sir.
Lieutenant Colonel Shelton, sir.
- What's your name, dipweed? - Barclay.
- Sir. - Louder.
Sir! Louder.
- Sir! - Louder! - Sir!
That's much better, new boy. That's much better.

the most pathetic thing I have ever seen!
Wouldn't you agree?
I asked you a question, nimrod.
No, sir! I don't agree, sir!
Are you contradicting me, you sorry-ass sack of shit?
You asshole.
What did you say? I said, "You asshole," sir!
Think you're pretty funny, don't you, De Silva?

translation.en: Yes, I do, sir.
Why don't you drop and give me 25 right now.

Twenty-five push-ups, De Silva.
One, sir! Two, sir! Three, sir!
You women might think...
that because you're so much more delicate...

and once a month we're just gonna get on out of your way.

The same rules apply for everybody.
18, sir!

21, sir! 22, sir! 23, sir!
One-handed.
Recover.

Sorry. Nothing from your dad today. Maybe tomorrow.

All right, kid.

Andy?

translation.ko: 좋아, 아가씨들 무기를 머리 위로 든다

translation.en: I want to see them high! Higher!
I think I'm gonna throw up.
[ Groans ] You're dead, new boy. Fucking geek.
"Dear Charles, you're it.
translation.ko: “나 찾아봐 너의 단짝으로부터 - 타일러” ‘찰스, 네가 술래야’

translation.en: Come and find me. Your best friend."
Shit!
Charles.
Come and find me.
Goddamn it.
Platoon! [ Cadets ] Hut!
Double time! Hut!
Knees up, ladies.
Whitehurst, where do the kids sleep? Above the portico. Why?
translation.ko: 와이트허스트 애들 숙소는 어디야? 현관 위, 왜?

translation.en: [ Ellis ] You're wearing combat boots, not ballet slippers!
translation.ko: 현관 위, 왜? 너희가 신은 건 발레화가 아니라 군화야

translation.en: Come on, move! Barclay.
[ Ellis ] It's gonna get worse than this.
Get the lead out. Come on! Move it!
Faster! Faster! Let's go! Get those knees in the sky! Come on!
translation.ko: 더 빨리! 뭐 해, 브록! 무릎 들어! 높이!

translation.en: You son of a bitch!
Got a hell of a punch there, Barclay.
Now we'll see what kind of tough guy you really are.
Get your head around here.
Tyler, come out, come out, wherever you are.
[ Chucky ] Olly, olly oxen free!
Get out here, you little son of a bitch!
[ Ellis ] Three! You're not sounding off!
Four! [ Ellis ] You're pissing me off!
Five! All right, Barclay. You got me curious.
What are you trying to prove?
Forget it. No, really. I want to know.
translation.ko: 신경 쓰지 마 아니, 진짜 알고 싶어

translation.en: All right. The doll's alive.
translation.ko: 좋아 인형이 살아있고 타일러를 쫓고 있어

translation.en: - He's after Tyler. - You're right. Forget it.
translation.ko: 인형이 살아있고 타일러를 쫓고 있어 내 참, 그만두자

translation.en: I hope he can take care of himself.
Shh-shh. Quiet. Shh-shh.
[ Whispers ] Shut up! Okay.
I can't believe I let you talk me into this.
translation.ko: 어서 네 장단에 넘어가다니 믿을 수 없다

translation.en: Okay, just stay here and keep an eye out.
Oh, I live for this. I know, Ivers.
Go. Go. Shh-shh.
I don't see what you see in that guy anyway.
I don't know. He's-- He's just different from everybody else.
translation.ko: 걔가 어디가 좋은지 모르겠어 글쎄, 다른 애들과 좀 달라

translation.en: Oh, please. Well, he's kind of cute too.
Okay.
[ De Silva ] Foster homes.
translation.ko: “정신 감정서” 위탁 가정이구나 조용한 이유가 있네

translation.en: No wonder he's so quiet.
- [ Thumping ] - [ Gasps ] What was that?
So you took the doll?
Shelton will have you court-martialed if he finds out.
translation.ko: 쉘튼이 알게 되면 널 군법 회의에 넘길 거야

translation.en: We're playing hide-and-seek. What are you guys doing?
We couldn't sleep. [ Gasps ]
Oh, he is so cute!
He was mine first! Give him back! Give him back! Shh!
[ Both Arguing ] You guys! Please be quiet!
Can you go stand guard? Yes, sir.
What's his name? Ask him yourself.
Oh, right. What is your name, little doll?
translation.ko: - 직접 물어봐요 - 그러지 네 이름이 뭐야?

translation.en: [ Good Guy Voice ] Hi, I'm Chucky, and I'm your friend to the end.
translation.ko: 안녕, 난 처키야 영원한 네 친구야

translation.en: Hi-de-ho. Ha ha ha!
I love it.
His real name is Charles Lee Ray.
Oh, is that so? Give me your lipstick. What for?
Just give it to me. Oh, no.
What are you doing? You'll see.
Wait! Stop!
[ De Silva ] Here you go, little baby.
[ Tyler ] You're messing him up. You're so cute.
Don't do that. Don't! He looks stupid!
You're making him look like a wuss!
No, he looks sweet. [ Door Slams ]
[ Sighs ] You guys, someone's coming.
Come on. Let's go. Come on! No, wait--
Let's go! Stop! What about Charles?
This means war.
What the hell?
- I like to be hugged. - Aah!
Aw, you gotta be fucking kiddin' me.
The man lives through two tours in Nam...
and then one night he just drops dead.
Doesn't make any sense.
[ Shelton ] At ease.
We will now take a moment of silence to honor Colonel Cochrane.
He was a fine man, and he will be sorely missed.
translation.ko: 그는 멋진 사람이었으며 그의 부재를 아쉬워할 것이다

translation.en: Bow your heads for prayer.
[ Shelton ] Take... seats!
It's gettin' pretty shaggy, Carlson.
I want to see you on Friday. Yes, Sergeant.
Monday, Fabrizzio. Yes, sir.
My man.
[ Groans ] Tuesday.
Look at you, Whitehurst. You're a disgrace.
When's the last time you had a trim?
Two weeks ago, Sergeant, I think. You think? You think?
I want to see you right after breakfast. You got it?
Yes, sir, Sergeant Botnick, sir.
And what are you looking at, new boy?
Wednesday.
Barclay, what're you doing?
You can't just get up in the middle of mess.
Major.
- At ease! - [ Laughing Stops ]
Tyler. Hi, Barclay. What's up?
I've got to talk to you about Chucky. You mean Charles.
translation.ko: 처키에 대해 말할 게 있어 찰스 말이지?

translation.en: Have you seen him?
Not since last night.
He's hiding somewhere.
translation.ko: 어딘가 숨어있을 거야 숨어있다가 네가 혼자일 때

translation.en: He's gonna lay low until he knows you're alone. Then he's gonna come after you.
translation.ko: 숨어있다가 네가 혼자일 때 널 쫓아올 거야

translation.en: He just wants to play. Listen to me.
translation.ko: 나랑 놀려는 것뿐이야 내 말 들어

translation.en: No matter what he says, no matter what he promises you,
translation.ko: 처키가 무슨 말을 하든 뭘 약속하든

translation.en: you've gotta stay away from him.
translation.ko: 처키가 무슨 말을 하든 뭘 약속하든 처키 근처에 있지 마

translation.en: Don't let him fool you. He's bad.
Charles isn't bad. He's a Good Guy.
It says so on his shirt.
translation.ko: 찰스는 착한 애야 옷에도 쓰여 있어

translation.en: He lies, Tyler. Believe me, he's bad news.
translation.ko: 거짓말이야, 타일러 내 말 믿어, 걘 나쁜 놈이야

translation.en: He's hurt a lot of people. I think Colonel Cochrane was one of them.
translation.ko: 많은 사람을 다치게 했어 코크런 대령님도 걔가 죽인 거 같아

translation.en: You're just jealous 'cause he's my best friend now instead of yours.
translation.ko: 형이 아니고 내가 걔의 단짝이라서 질투하는 거야

translation.en: Look... you better keep this.
Whitehurst, you are, without a doubt,
the sorriest excuse for a soldier to ever disgrace these walls.
translation.ko: 이곳에 망신을 준 병사 중 최악이야

translation.en: Face it. You're not cut out for this life.
translation.ko: 까놓고 말해 넌 여기 안 맞아

translation.en: Why don't you do yourself a favor and get the hell out of Kent?
translation.ko: 너 자신을 위해 여기서 나가는 게 어때?

translation.en: If I had any choice in the matter, I would, sir.
Smart ass.
Presto. You're bald. [ Chuckles ]
[ Sniffs ] Yeah.
What the hell?
How'd you get in there?
That haircut ain't regulation, soldier.
When's the last time you had a trim, huh?
Kiss it good-bye.
Presto. You're dead.
It's definitely you.
I just forgot my --
The annual war games...
have been an unbroken tradition here at Kent for over 50 years.
Colonel Cochrane was a man who believed in the value of tradition.
He not only would have wanted us to go on,
translation.ko: 그는 우리가 전통을 계속 이어가길 바라실 뿐 아니라

translation.en: he'd have ordered us to go on.
Therefore... the war games... will proceed as scheduled.
Lieutenant Colonel Shelton... will command the blue team.
Major Rawlings will head up the reds.
The objective is simple--
to capture the other team's flag,
bring it back here safely to base.
Rawlings.
You will pick up your weapons in the armory before moving out.
translation.ko: 시작 전에 무기고에서 각자의 소총을 받을 것이다

translation.en: You will be using the standard issue Springfield aught-three.
translation.ko: 군 표준 1903년식 스프링필드 소총을 쓸 것이다

translation.en: Your ammo.
Shelton.
If you get hit, you are dead.
Hike back to base.
Commanders... take charge of your teams.
May the best team win.
Good luck, men and women.
Nice of you to join us.
Looks like Botnick's in a pretty bad mood today.
translation.ko: 오늘 보트닉 기분이 아주 안 좋아 보이던데

translation.en: What's wrong?
Nothing. Nothing's wrong.
Nothing's wrong. I'm fine. Nothing's wrong.
This oughta slow the pricks down.
[ Instructor ] Left, left, left.
[ Instructor, Cadets Continue Chanting ] What's going on, Whitehurst?
You saw something, didn't you? You saw Chucky.
translation.ko: 뭘 본 거지? 처키를 본 거야

translation.en: Don't wimp out on me now, Whitehurst. I need your help.
That kid needs your help. I didn't see anything.
translation.ko: 난 네 도움이 필요해 타일러도 네 도움이 필요해 난 본 거 없어, 알겠어?

translation.en: Okay? I didn't see anything at all.
translation.ko: 난 본 거 없어, 알겠어? 전혀 본 거 없어

translation.en: Ellis, let's make sure all the perimeters are secure. Yes, sir.
She checks all the windows.
And the babysitter hears this thump, thump, thumping,
like something's being dragged across the floor upstairs.
translation.ko: 마치 위층에서 무언가를 끄는 듯이 말이야

translation.en: Then suddenly she thinks, "I haven't checked on the children."
translation.ko: 보모는 갑자기 애들을 살피지 않은 게 생각났어

translation.en: So she hurries to the top of the stairs,
and when she gets there...
she sees her boyfriend completely dismembered,
translation.ko: 자기 남자 친구가 완전히 사지가 절단된 채

translation.en: dragging himself across the floor by his chin.
translation.ko: 턱으로 몸통을 끌어 기어가는 걸 봤어

translation.en: Thump, slide.
Thump, slide. [ Boy Groaning ]
Thump, slide.
[ Ivers ] That was gross.
Hey, you guys, I got a better story. And it's true.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 더 재밌는 얘기가 있어 실화기도 하지

translation.en: It's about this mental institution... and it's a few miles away from here.
Hey.
Hope it wasn't something I said.
translation.ko: 내 얘기 때문에 나온 건 아니지?

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] No. I'm sorry.
De Silva, where do you think the red team's camped out?
Could be anywhere. Shelton'll find 'em. He always does.
translation.ko: 어딘가 있겠지 늘 그렇듯 쉘튼이 찾아낼 거야

translation.en: By the way, you can call me Kristin.
What? Kristin.
It's my first name.
Do you have one? Andy.
Oh.
Come on, Andy. I want to show you something.
Pretty cool, huh?
Yeah.
I almost forgot there are places like that...
translation.ko: 저런 곳도 있는 건 거의 잊고 살았네

translation.en: where people just go to have fun.
[ Twig Snaps ] Listen!
Somebody's out there.
It's probably just a chipmunk or something.
Nothing scares you, does it?
No.
Man, I really got to get out of this body.
translation.ko: 아 진짜, 빨리 이 몸에서 나가고 싶네

translation.en: I'm going after Tyler.
Are you crazy? You'll never find him. Wanna bet?
translation.ko: 미쳤어? 절대 못 찾을 거야 내기할래?

translation.en: I swiped this from Shelton's tent.
He sent out a reconnaissance mission right before we pitched camp.
translation.ko: 우리가 병영을 세우기 전에 정찰대를 보냈어

translation.en: The red team is somewhere around here.
That kid's a sitting duck, Whitehurst.
Are you with me or not?
I'm sorry. I can't.
[ Ellis ] Up and at 'em, ladies. We're movin' out.
I want this camp to be a ghost town in five minutes.
I thought we weren't going until dawn, sir.
Someone stole the reconnaissance map out of the colonel's tent,
translation.ko: 누가 중령 텐트에서 정찰 지도를 훔쳤다

translation.en: so we're making our move now.
translation.ko: 누가 중령 텐트에서 정찰 지도를 훔쳤다 당장 움직인다

translation.en: Get going, Hanley.
Whitehurst. You wouldn't know anything about a missing map, would you?
translation.ko: 와이트허스트! 사라진 지도에 대해 아는 거 있어?

translation.en: Where the hell's Barclay? Whitehurst!
Colonel Shelton, you better have a look in here, sir.
What is it, Ellis?
Barclay's gone AWOL, sir.
He stole the map.
That little fucking traitor's doubling for the reds.
Where's Tyler? He went AWOL with some guy named Charles.
translation.ko: 타일러는 어딨어? 찰스란 놈과 무단 탈영했어

translation.en: Where's Andy?
Whitehurst, where is he?
[ Shelton ] Platoon, halt!
All right. De Silva, you're gonna take the right flank.
Siegel, take the left. Check in on the radio every five minutes.
Yes, sir. All right, move it.
The rest of us are gonna spread out and meet up with Ellis at Split Rock.
translation.ko: 나머지는 흩어져서 엘리스와 스플릿 록에서 만난다

translation.en: Move out.
Whitehurst, move!
Thanks for coming after me. What are friends for?
translation.ko: 날 따라와 줘 고마워 당연하지, 친군데

translation.en: Duck!
That was a close one.
Now we can play "Hide the Soul."
I'm tired. I don't wanna play that dumb game anymore.
translation.ko: 지쳤어, 그 멍청한 게임은 더 하고 싶지 않아

translation.en: You're a fuckin' drag. You know that?
- Watch your mouth, Charles. - Stop calling me that!
What's the knife for?
A good soldier is always prepared, Tyler.
Barclay was right. You're not a good guy.
translation.ko: 바클레이 말이 맞았어 넌 착한 애가 아니야

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] Sorry, kid. You got me. I'm bad.
Now, assume the position.
- No! - Aaah!
Get back here!
Barclay! Barclay!
Tyler!
You fuckin' traitor. Give me my map!
Listen to me, Shelton-- You got any idea what we do to traitors, Barclay?
Tyler's in trouble. Come on, Whitehurst. Back me up.
translation.ko: 타일러한테 문제가 생겼어 와이트허스트, 말 좀 해봐

translation.en: Major Ellis, call in the flanks. Yes, sir.
De Silva, Siegel, do you copy?
De Silva, do you copy?
[ Radio: Ellis ] De Silva, come in.
Siegel's on his way back. No word yet from De Silva.
translation.ko: 시겔은 오는 길이고 드 실바한테선 응답이 없습니다

translation.en: Well, keep tryin'. Yes, sir.
Help! Help! Tyler!
Barclay! Are you okay, Tyler?
Well, looks like we got ourselves a little P.O.W. You were right.
translation.ko: 꼬마 전쟁 포로를 잡은 것 같군 바클레이가 맞았어, 찰스는 나빠

translation.en: Charles is bad. He tried to hurt me.
translation.ko: 바클레이가 맞았어, 찰스는 나빠 날 해치려 했어

translation.en: Who the hell's Charles?
[ Radio: Chucky ] Come in, Barclay. Come in.
- Who the hell is that? - It's Charles.
Who is this? Put Barclay on, jarhead.
[ Ellis ] It's the reds. They're up to something.
What do you want? I want the kid.
Bring him up to the old Jeep or there'll be hell to pay.
translation.ko: 타일러를 원해 지프가 있는 곳으로 데려오지 않으면 끔찍한 일을 당할 거야

translation.en: [ De Silva ] Andy, don't do it. De Silva!
You hear that, Barclay? Don't touch her, you son of a bitch.
translation.ko: 들었나, 바클레이? 걔 건드리지 마, 망할 자식

translation.en: Now bring me the kid, or I'll waste her.
Red Team, Red Team. Come in, Red Team.
This is Red Team. Over. We got a situation up here at the old Jeep.
translation.ko: 홍군이다, 오버 지프차 근처에서 상황이 발생했다

translation.en: Blue Team sighted. Advise you to move your troops in.
Hope they like the taste of lead.
Now just sit back and watch the sparks fly.
translation.ko: 이제 편히 앉아서 총알이 날아다니는 거 구경이나 할까?

translation.en: All right, you two are gonna go on up ahead, draw 'em out.
translation.ko: 자, 너희 둘이 앞장을 서서 적을 끌어내

translation.en: The rest of us are gonna circle around. Shelton, this is no game.
translation.ko: 나머지는 포위한다 쉘튼, 이건 게임이 아냐

translation.en: This guy is dangerous.
Relax, Barclay. It's only paint.
All right, let's do it.
I'm scared, Barclay.
Yeah, me too.
All right, kid. Get over here!
No!
Don't fuck with me!
I'll blow all of you to pieces.
Beat it!
Now just get down and shut up.
Yeah!
Hold your fire! Hold your fire!
De Silva, where the hell is everybody?
Hi, soldier. [ Cackling ]
[ Chuckles ] Fuck me.
All right! [ Cackling ] [ Gunshot ]
Shit! Stay down!
[ Gunshots ] Jesus. They're using live rounds!
Hold your fire! Hold your fire!
Hold your fire! [ Chucky Cackling ]
Oh, God, he's not breathing! Get away from him!
You did this, didn't you? You sick son of a bitch.
Now I'm gonna kill you! Get off me!
Stop it! Get off of him! He didn't do it! Let go of me!
translation.ko: 그만해! 떨어져! 걔가 한 게 아냐! - 놔! - 그만해!

translation.en: Sayonara, suckers.
Get off him! He didn't do it! he didn't do it!
translation.ko: 떨어져! 그만해! 걔가 한 게 아냐!

translation.en: Get off! He didn't do it! Stop!
translation.ko: - 놔줘 - 걔가 한 게 아냐! 그만!

translation.en: Look out!
No! Oh, my God, what happened?
[ Ellis ] It's Whitehurst. Oh, my God.
What the hell happened? Who fucked with the rifles? I don't know!
translation.ko: 엘리스, 어떻게 된 거야? 어떻게 된 거야? - 모르겠어 - 누가 소총에 수작 부렸어?

translation.en: [ Ellis ] Get Clark on the radio. Yes, sir.
translation.ko: - 몰라 - 그래 - 무전으로 클락 호출해 - 네

translation.en: And get me a medic up here right now!
[ Ellis ] Everybody stay calm.
Epstein, I want that radio! Oh, God.
♪♪ [ Speakers: Rock, Loud ] This is the last time I'm gonna tell you.
Give that thing a rest or you're out of here, both of you.
translation.ko: 그거 안 끌 거면 둘 다 여기서 나가

translation.en: We're not bothering anybody. You're bothering me. Keep it down!
translation.ko: 누가 뭐라고 안 하잖아요 내가 하잖아, 그거 꺼!

translation.en: ♪♪ [ Off ] Geez!
Mister, Mister, you gotta help me!
What's wrong? What's the matter? Charles. Charles. He's after me.
Who's Charles? He's a Good Guy. He wants to play "Hide the Soul."
translation.ko: - 찰스가 누구야? - 좋은 친구 인형요 - 영혼 숨바꼭질을 하재요 - 진정하렴!

translation.en: Okay, slow down. Slow down. Have a seat over there.
translation.ko: - 영혼 숨바꼭질을 하재요 - 진정하렴! 저기 앉아라, 켄트에서 왔니?

translation.en: Are you from Kent? Yes, sir.
What's your name, son?
Ronald Tyler. Private first class, sir.
Have a seat. How 'bout some gum, Private?
I know how it must hurt... when a friend does something bad to you.
Sure does.
But I bet your friend-- What's his name? Charles?
translation.ko: 네 친구는 말야… 이름이 뭐랬지? 찰스?

translation.en: I bet you Charles didn't mean it.
- I bet you he's really sorry. - No, he isn't.
He wants to hurt me.
Nobody's gonna hurt you.
Hey, I know what'll cheer you up.
translation.ko: 아무도 널 해치지 않는단다 네 기분을 돋워줄 걸 알지

translation.en: Look what I found.
Here's your prize. There you go.
Thank you, Daddy. Let's go on the Super Loop.
Yeah! Yeah!
Hey. Hey, maybe somebody's seen him.
Oh, God.
Come on. Wait.
Mommy, Mommy, I loved it!
Were you scared? No! No!
Let's have some popcorn and we'll go on one more ride.
translation.ko: 팝콘 먹고 한 번 더 타자

translation.en: [ Chucky ] Perfect. In there.
Don't even think about it.
Come on. Okay.
In there!
[ Chucky ] Time to play.
This looks good. Park it.
- [ Screams ] - Shit!
Barclay! Barclay! In here!
He's got a gun!
Yeah-yeah!
Are you okay? Oh, my God.
[ Sobbing ] Oh, God.
Here. Take it.
You can do it.
I'll be okay.
[ Yelling ] Help! Help!
Yeah! You're mine now, Tyler.
translation.ko: 제발 도와줘! 넌 이제 내 거야

translation.en: [ Screaming ] Oh, God!
- Tyler! - Barclay!
Tyler, watch out!
Shit!
This is it, kid. End of the line.
Give me the power, I beg of you!
Keep both eyes open. Hold your breath.
translation.ko: 두 눈을 다 뜨고 숨을 참아

translation.en: Yeah!
